snippet: Tacquería Auténtica started as a stand, then became a food truck and is now a bricks-and-mortar restaurant. The tacos are roughly the diameter of a small saucer.
abstract: Tammy La Gorce reviews Taqueria Autentica in Bloomfield (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Tacquería Auténtica started as a stand, then became a food truck and is now a bricks-and-mortar restaurant. The tacos are roughly the diameter of a small saucer.

headline.seo: At Taquería Auténtica in Bloomfield, Tacos That Fit in the Palm
headline.main: Tacos That Fit in the Palm
headline.print_headline: Tacos That Fit in the Palm
